TopicTitle: Help i cant go into the vab and, when i go into the place where you get kerbal's i Cant exit and i cant do anything i just got the game yesterday

Articles.Content: Its very sad that im not able to play the game.
Has it been this way the whole time or was it working and then stopped?
it was the whole time its very frustrating
Moved to Game Play Questions until we decide it's a tech issue.

What happens when you click on the buildings? Does it give you any error messages? 

Can you try re-downloading the game? Or if you got it through Steam, verifying files?

no it just doesn't do anything I

cant go into buildings  it doesn't even give me error messages

besides clicking on the building, there is an icon in the lower left of the screen that lets you access the various buildings.

i have a similar bug popping up sometimes, where clicking on the vab does nothing, but clicking on the icon in the bottom left corner works
